preset.name: Celestial Radiance
preset.description: A preset that evokes the glistening angelic sunshine, creating a bright and ethereal atmosphere.

parameter_reasoning.threshold: Lowered threshold for a gentle gating effect
parameter_reasoning.attack: Faster attack to preserve initial transients
parameter_reasoning.release: Optimized release time for smooth gating

parameter_reasoning.param1: Adjusted frequency shaping for a balanced tonal profile
parameter_reasoning.param2: Reduced surgical precision for a more natural sound

parameter_reasoning.decay: Increased for a longer, angelic decay
parameter_reasoning.mix: Adjusted for a balanced reverb presence
parameter_reasoning.pitch: Optimized to enhance the ethereal pitch overtones
parameter_reasoning.pre-delay: Set for a subtle delay before reverb onset

parameter_reasoning.drive: Adjusted for a moderate harmonic enhancement
parameter_reasoning.clarity: Optimized for a balanced clarity boost
parameter_reasoning.presence: Balanced for an airy and present sound

metadata.signal_chain_analysis: Reordered the signal chain to Noise Gate → Parametric EQ → Shimmer Reverb → Harmonic Exciter → None → None
metadata.parameter_adjustments: Adjusted parameters in each engine to enhance the balanced, glistening angelic sunshine character at a moderate intensity level.
metadata.musical_reasoning: By optimizing the signal chain and adjusting parameters, the preset now delivers a balanced, glistening angelic sunshine sound with clarity and ethereal qualities.
